exercises.name: Wall Ankle Mobilizations
exercises.description: Knee-to-wall drill improving dorsiflexion range for squats/lunges by maintaining heel contact while knee touches wall.
exercises.method:
1. Face wall with toes 4-6" away
2. Keep heel down as knee touches wall
3. Hold 2 seconds at end range
4. Adjust distance to maintain challenge

exercises.name: Single-Leg Mini Squat Hold
exercises.description: Isometric unilateral hold to strengthen VMO and challenge ankle stability.
exercises.method:
1. Stand on one leg with slight knee bend
2. Align knee over mid-foot
3. Hold 20-30 seconds
4. Maintain neutral pelvis

exercises.name: Ab Tucks
exercises.description: Seated abdominal isolation emphasizing posterior pelvic tilt for lower ab recruitment.
exercises.method:
1. Sit with knees bent, feet lifted
2. Hands behind thighs for support
3. Exhale while tucking knees in
4. Inhale to return with control

exercises.name: Alternating Arm Raises
exercises.description: Dynamic shoulder preparation through full sagittal plane range with scapular control.
exercises.method:
1. Stand with scapulae retracted
2. Slowly raise one arm overhead
3. Lower with control (3-4 seconds)
4. Alternate arms rhythmically

exercises.name: Back Fists
exercises.description: Rotational striking movement developing shoulder stability and transverse plane core engagement.
exercises.method:
1. Athletic stance, elbows bent 90°
2. Rotate from hips to extend arm
3. Strike at shoulder height
4. Retract faster than extension

exercises.name: Back Step w/ Forward Arm Raises
exercises.description: Coordinated movement combining lower-body stability with shoulder activation.
exercises.method:
1. Stand tall, arms at sides
2. Step back with one leg
3. Simultaneously raise arms forward
4. Return to start with control

exercises.name: Bear / Beast Hold
exercises.description: Static quadruped position for core and shoulder stability.
exercises.method:
1. On hands and knees, lift knees slightly
2. Maintain flat back
3. Hold position steadily
4. Breathe normally

exercises.name: Bear Walk / Crawl
exercises.description: Dynamic crawling movement for full-body coordination.
exercises.method:
1. Start in bear hold position
2. Move opposite hand/foot forward
3. Keep hips stable
4. Maintain controlled movement

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunches / Kicks
exercises.description: Rotational core exercise targeting obliques dynamically.
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back, hands behind head
2. Bring elbow to opposite knee
3. Alternate sides smoothly
4. Keep lower back pressed down

exercises.name: Bicycle Kicks - Legs Only
exercises.description: Lower ab isolation with reduced neck strain.
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back, hands under hips
2. Alternate leg movements
3. Small circles engage lower abs
4. Control the tempo

exercises.name: Bird Dog - Dynamic
exercises.description: Alternating limb extensions for anti-rotation core training.
exercises.method:
1. On hands and knees
2. Extend opposite arm/leg
3. Return with control
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Bird Dog - Static
exercises.description: Isometric hold for core and glute endurance.
exercises.method:
1. Extend opposite limbs
2. Hold position steadily
3. Maintain neutral spine
4. Breathe normally

exercises.name: Boat Pose
exercises.description: Yoga pose for core and hip flexor strength.
exercises.method:
1. Sit with knees bent
2. Lean back, lift feet
3. Extend arms forward
4. Hold with engaged core

exercises.name: Bounce & Cross Punch
exercises.description: Boxing combination with rebound steps for coordination.
exercises.method:
1. Athletic stance, slight bounce
2. Throw cross-body punch
3. Alternate sides
4. Maintain light footwork

exercises.name: Bounce & Straight Punch
exercises.method:
1. Stand with feet shoulder-width
2. Small bounce with each punch
3. Alternate arms
4. Keep elbows slightly bent

exercises.name: Bounce & Up Punch
exercises.method:
1. Start in athletic stance
2. Small jump with each punch
3. Punch upward at 45° angle
4. Land softly

exercises.name: Bridge Pose
exercises.description: Yoga backbend for hip and chest opening.
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back, knees bent
2. Press through heels to lift hips
3. Interlace fingers if possible
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Bunny Hop
exercises.method:
1. Quarter squat position
2. Explode upward, knees to chest
3. Land softly
4. Immediately rebound

exercises.name: Burpee - Modified to Step
exercises.method:
1. Stand to plank (step back)
2. Optional push-up
3. Step feet forward
4. Return to standing

exercises.name: Burpees + Jump
exercises.method:
1. Squat, hands to floor
2. Jump back to plank
3. Jump feet forward
4. Explode upward

exercises.name: Burpees + Push-up
exercises.description: Full-body explosive movement with added chest challenge.
exercises.method:
1. Squat down, hands to floor
2. Jump back to plank
3. Perform strict push-up
4. Jump feet forward

exercises.name: Burpees + Push-up + Jump
exercises.method:
1. Perform standard burpee with push-up
2. After standing, add vertical jump
3. Land softly
4. Immediately descend

exercises.name: Butt Kicks
exercises.description: Running in place variation emphasizing hamstring engagement.
exercises.method:
1. Stand tall with core engaged
2. Alternate bringing heels to glutes
3. Maintain quick cadence
4. Keep torso upright

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: Isolated ankle extension movement for calf development.
exercises.method:
1. Stand on edge of step
2. Lift heels as high as possible
3. Slowly lower below step level
4. Control entire range

exercises.name: Cat Cow
exercises.method:
1. Start on hands and knees
2. Inhale: Arch back (Cow)
3. Exhale: Round spine (Cat)
4. Flow smoothly between positions

exercises.name: Chair Pose
exercises.description: Yoga squat hold for leg endurance.
exercises.method:
1. Stand with feet together
2. Lower into squat position
3. Arms raised overhead
4. Hold with engaged core

exercises.name: Chest Opener with Butt Kicks
exercises.description: Combination of upper-body stretch and dynamic leg movement.
exercises.method:
1. Clasp hands behind back
2. Lift arms while kicking heels up
3. Maintain upright posture
4. Coordinate breath with movement

exercises.name: Cinderblock Rows
exercises.description: Bent-over rows using a cinderblock for resistance.
exercises.method:
1. Hinge at hips with flat back
2. Hold cinderblock with both hands
3. Pull elbows back to torso
4. Control descent

exercises.name: Commando Plank
exercises.description: Dynamic plank variation with forearm-to-hand transitions.
exercises.method:
1. Start in forearm plank
2. Push up to one hand
3. Alternate sides with control
4. Maintain rigid torso

exercises.name: Cossack Squat
exercises.method:
1. Wide stance, toes pointed out
2. Shift weight to one side
3. Keep opposite leg straight
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Crab Walk
exercises.description: Reverse tabletop movement for shoulder and hip strength.
exercises.method:
1. Sit with hands and feet on floor
2. Lift hips to tabletop position
3. Walk backward/forward
4. Keep hips high

exercises.name: Cross Punches
exercises.method:
1. Athletic stance, elbows bent
2. Rotate torso to punch across body
3. Alternate sides
4. Keep wrists straight

exercises.name: Crow Pose
exercises.description: Arm balance pose for core and wrist strength.
exercises.method:
1. Squat with hands on floor
2. Place knees on triceps
3. Shift weight forward
4. Lift feet slowly

exercises.name: Deadlift (Single Leg)
exercises.description: Unilateral hip hinge for balance and hamstring focus.
exercises.method:
1. Stand on one leg, slight knee bend
2. Hinge at hips with flat back
3. Reach toward floor
4. Return to start

exercises.name: Deadlift (Two Legs)
exercises.description: Classic hip hinge for posterior chain strength.
exercises.method:
1. Feet hip-width, soft knees
2. Hinge at hips, bar close to body
3. Drive through heels to stand
4. Control descent

exercises.name: Diamond Push-ups
exercises.method:
1. Hands form diamond shape
2. Lower chest to hands
3. Keep elbows close to body
4. Push back up

exercises.name: Dip & Back Kick
exercises.description: Coordinated dip and leg extension for mobility.
exercises.method:
1. Stand with hands on hips
2. Small squat (dip)
3. Kick one leg back
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Dip & Reach
exercises.method:
1. Small squat (dip)
2. Explode upward with reach
3. Land softly
4. Repeat

exercises.name: Donkey Kick / Fire Hydrant Combo
exercises.description: Glute activation sequence with hip abduction.
exercises.method:
1. On hands and knees
2. Kick leg back (donkey kick)
3. Return to knee lift (fire hydrant)
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Donkey Kicks
exercises.method:
1. On hands and knees
2. Keep knee bent 90°
3. Lift heel toward ceiling
4. Control movement

exercises.name: Downward Facing Dog
exercises.description: Yoga pose for hamstring and shoulder flexibility.
exercises.method:
1. Start on hands and knees
2. Lift hips up and back
3. Straighten legs if possible
4. Press chest toward thighs

exercises.name: Drawing Bow
exercises.method:
1. Stand with one arm extended
2. Pull back as if drawing bow
3. Hold tension
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Dynamic Side Lunge
exercises.method:
1. Step wide to one side
2. Bend knee, keep other leg straight
3. Push back to center
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Elbow Plank
exercises.method:
1. Forearms on ground, elbows under shoulders
2. Form straight line from head to heels
3. Engage core
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Fire Hydrants
exercises.description: Hip abduction for gluteus medius strength.
exercises.method:
1. On hands and knees
2. Lift knee out to side
3. Keep hip at 90°
4. Control movement

exercises.name: Flutter Kicks
exercises.description: Supine leg lifts for lower abs.
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back, hands under hips
2. Lift legs slightly
3. Alternate small kicks
4. Keep lower back pressed down

exercises.name: Forward Jumping Squat
exercises.method:
1. Start in squat position
2. Explode forward with jump
3. Land softly in squat
4. Immediately repeat

exercises.name: Frog Crunches
exercises.description: Abdominal crunch with wide knee position.
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back, knees wide
2. Hands behind head
3. Crunch upward
4. Control descent

exercises.name: Froggers
exercises.method:
1. Start in standing position
2. Drop into squat, hands to floor
3. Jump back to plank
4. Jump feet forward to squat

exercises.name: Front Leg Raises
exercises.method:
1. Stand tall, hold onto support if needed
2. Lift one leg straight forward
3. Control movement
4. Alternate legs

exercises.name: Forward Lunges
exercises.description: Basic lunge for unilateral leg strength.
exercises.method:
1. Step forward with one leg
2. Lower until both knees at 90°
3. Push back to start
4. Alternate legs

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back, knees bent
2. Lift hips to full extension
3. Squeeze glutes at top
4. Lower with control

exercises.name: Good Morning
exercises.method:
1. Stand with hands behind head
2. Hinge at hips with slight knee bend
3. Keep back flat
4. Return to standing

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: Running in place with exaggerated knee lifts.
exercises.method:
1. Stand tall, core engaged
2. Drive knees upward
3. Land softly
4. Maintain quick pace

exercises.name: Hip Thrust + Single Leg
exercises.method:
1. Shoulders on bench, one leg extended
2. Drive through heel to lift hips
3. Squeeze glutes at top
4. Lower with control

exercises.name: Indian Pushup
exercises.description: Dynamic yoga push-up for full-body strength.
exercises.method:
1. Start in downward dog
2. Lower into cobra position
3. Push back to downward dog
4. Flow continuously

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.method:
1. Start with feet together
2. Jump feet wide while raising arms
3. Return to start
4. Maintain rhythm

exercises.name: Jumping Lunges
exercises.method:
1. Lunge position
2. Explode upward, switch legs
3. Land softly in lunge
4. Immediately repeat

exercises.name: Jumping Squats
exercises.method:
1. Squat to parallel
2. Explode upward with arm swing
3. Land softly in squat
4. Immediately repeat

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swing
exercises.description: Hip-driven swing for posterior chain power.
exercises.method:
1. Hinge at hips, kettlebell between legs
2. Drive hips forward explosively
3. Let arms swing to chest height
4. Control backswing

exercises.name: Knee Pushup
exercises.method:
1. Knees on ground, hands shoulder-width
2. Lower chest to ground
3. Keep body straight
4. Push back up

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.method:
1. Step forward with one leg
2. Lower until both knees at 90°
3. Push back to start
4. Alternate legs

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: Dynamic plank with alternating knee drives.
exercises.method:
1. Plank position
2. Drive one knee toward chest
3. Alternate legs quickly
4. Keep hips stable

exercises.name: Nordic Curl
exercises.method:
1. Kneel with feet anchored
2. Slowly lower torso forward
3. Use arms to control descent
4. Push back to start

exercises.name: Plank Hold
exercises.method:
1. Hands under shoulders
2. Form straight line from head to heels
3. Engage core
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.method:
1. Plank position, hands shoulder-width
2. Lower chest to ground
3. Keep elbows at 45°
4. Push back up

exercises.name: Reverse Lunges
exercises.description: Lunge stepping backward for quad focus.
exercises.method:
1. Step back with one leg
2. Lower until both knees at 90°
3. Push back to start
4. Alternate legs

exercises.name: Side Lunges
exercises.method:
1. Step wide to one side
2. Bend knee, keep other leg straight
3. Push back to center
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.method:
1. Feet shoulder-width or wider
2. Lower hips below knees
3. Keep chest up
4. Drive through heels

exercises.name: Superman
exercises.description: Prone back extension for spinal erectors.
exercises.method:
1. Lie face down
2. Lift arms and legs simultaneously
3. Hold at top
4. Lower with control

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.method:
1. Hands on bench behind you
2. Lower body by bending elbows
3. Keep elbows pointing back
4. Push back up

exercises.name: Walking Lunges
exercises.method:
1. Step forward into lunge
2. Push up and bring back leg forward
3. Continue alternating
4. Maintain upright torso

exercises.name: Walking Sumo Squat (Deep)
exercises.description: Wide-stance squat walk for hip mobility.
exercises.method:
1. Wide stance, toes pointed out
2. Lower into deep squat
3. Take small steps forward
4. Maintain squat position

exercises.name: Warrior I
exercises.description: Yoga pose for leg and shoulder strength.
exercises.method:
1. Lunge position, back foot at 45°
2. Raise arms overhead
3. Square hips forward
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Wide Pushup
exercises.description: Push-up with hands wider than shoulders.
exercises.method:
1. Hands wider than shoulders
2. Lower chest to ground
3. Keep body straight
4. Push back up

exercises.name: Wrist Rotations
exercises.method:
1. Extend arms forward
2. Rotate wrists in circles
3. Alternate directions
4. Control movement

exercises.name: Door Bar Chin-Up Negatives
exercises.description: Eccentric chin-up for back and arm strength.
exercises.method:
1. Start at top of chin-up position
2. Slowly lower down (4-6 seconds)
3. Reset at bottom
4. Repeat

exercises.name: Door Bar Dead Hang
exercises.description: Static hang to improve grip and shoulder stability.
exercises.method:
1. Hang from bar with straight arms
2. Engage shoulders
3. Maintain neutral spine
4. Hold for time

exercises.name: Down Dog w/ Knee Push-Up
exercises.description: Yoga push-up hybrid for core and shoulders.
exercises.method:
1. Start in downward dog
2. Lower into modified push-up
3. Push back to downward dog
4. Repeat

exercises.name: Downward Dog Push-Up
exercises.method:
1. Start in plank position
2. Push hips up to downward dog
3. Lower back to plank
4. Flow continuously

exercises.name: Floor Touches
exercises.method:
1. Stand with feet together
2. Hinge at hips to reach toward toes
3. Keep knees slightly bent
4. Return to standing

exercises.name: Half Handstand (Heels Up)
exercises.description: Inverted pose for shoulder and core strength.
exercises.method:
1. Downward dog position
2. Walk feet closer to hands
3. Lift one leg at a time
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Handstands (3/4)
exercises.method:
1. Start in downward dog
2. Kick up to partial handstand
3. Use wall for support if needed
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Hip Openers
exercises.method:
1. Stand on one leg
2. Circle other leg in controlled motion
3. Alternate directions
4. Switch legs

exercises.name: Hook Punches
exercises.method:
1. Athletic stance, elbows bent
2. Rotate torso to throw hook punch
3. Keep wrist straight
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Inchworm
exercises.description: Forward fold to plank movement for hamstrings.
exercises.method:
1. Stand, fold forward to touch toes
2. Walk hands out to plank
3. Walk feet back to hands
4. Repeat

exercises.name: Kettlebell Goblet Squat
exercises.description: Front-loaded squat for leg and core strength.
exercises.method:
1. Hold kettlebell at chest
2. Squat deep, elbows inside knees
3. Keep chest upright
4. Drive through heels

exercises.name: Kettlebell Overhead Squat
exercises.description: Squat with overhead weight for full-body challenge.
exercises.method:
1. Press kettlebell overhead
2. Squat while keeping weight stable
3. Maintain upright torso
4. Stand back up

exercises.name: Low Plank Climbers
exercises.description: Slow mountain climbers for core endurance.
exercises.method:
1. Forearm plank position
2. Slowly bring one knee to elbow
3. Alternate sides
4. Keep hips stable

exercises.name: Lying Leg Raises
exercises.description: Supine leg lift for lower abs.
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back, hands under hips
2. Lift legs to 90°
3. Lower slowly
4. Keep lower back pressed down

exercises.name: Lying Scissor Kicks
exercises.description: Alternating leg movements for lower abs.
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back, hands under hips
2. Alternate lifting legs
3. Small, controlled movements
4. Keep lower back down

exercises.name: Marches
exercises.method:
1. Stand tall
2. Alternate lifting knees
3. Add arm swing
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Mod Boat Pose
exercises.description: Modified yoga pose for core strength.
exercises.method:
1. Sit with knees bent, feet down
2. Lean back slightly
3. Lift feet slightly
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers - Slow
exercises.description: Controlled plank knee drives for core stability.
exercises.method:
1. Plank position
2. Slowly bring one knee to chest
3. Alternate sides
4. Keep hips stable

exercises.name: Oblique Side Crunches
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back, knees bent
2. Hands behind head
3. Crunch with rotation
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Pigeon Pose
exercises.description: Yoga stretch for hip flexors and glutes.
exercises.method:
1. From tabletop, bring one knee forward
2. Extend other leg back
3. Square hips
4. Hold stretch

exercises.name: Pike Pushup
exercises.method:
1. Downward dog position
2. Bend elbows to lower head toward floor
3. Push back up
4. Keep hips high

exercises.name: Plank Back Kicks
exercises.method:
1. Plank position
2. Kick one leg straight back
3. Alternate legs
4. Keep hips stable

exercises.name: Plank Jack
exercises.method:
1. Plank position
2. Jump feet wide then together
3. Maintain straight body line
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Plank Rotations
exercises.method:
1. Side plank position
2. Rotate through center to other side
3. Alternate sides
4. Control movement

exercises.name: Plank Shoulder Taps
exercises.method:
1. Plank position
2. Tap opposite shoulder with hand
3. Alternate sides
4. Minimize hip movement

exercises.name: Punch and Butt Kick
exercises.method:
1. Athletic stance
2. Throw punch then kick heel to glute
3. Alternate sides
4. Maintain rhythm

exercises.name: Rabbit Walk
exercises.method:
1. On hands and knees
2. Round spine upward
3. Take small steps forward
4. Keep rounded position

exercises.name: Reverse Crunch
exercises.description: Supine leg curl for lower abs.
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back, knees bent
2. Lift hips off floor
3. Curl knees toward chest
4. Lower with control

exercises.name: Reverse Plank
exercises.description: Posterior chain hold for glutes and shoulders.
exercises.method:
1. Sit with legs extended
2. Place hands behind hips
3. Lift hips to straight line
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Scissor Jacks
exercises.method:
1. Start with legs crossed
2. Jump to wide stance
3. Cross opposite leg forward
4. Alternate

exercises.name: Seated Leg Raises
exercises.description: Seated alternating leg lifts for hip flexors.
exercises.method:
1. Sit on edge of chair
2. Alternate lifting legs
3. Keep torso upright
4. Control movement

exercises.name: Shadow Boxing + Kick
exercises.method:
1. Basic boxing stance
2. Throw combinations
3. Add front kicks between punches
4. Maintain form

exercises.name: Side Balance Jumps
exercises.method:
1. Stand on one leg
2. Jump side to side
3. Land softly
4. Maintain balance

exercises.name: Side Elbow Plank
exercises.description: Side plank on elbows for obliques.
exercises.method:
1. Side forearm plank
2. Stack feet
3. Lift hips
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Side Leg Raises
exercises.description: Lateral leg lifts for gluteus medius.
exercises.method:
1. Lie on side, legs stacked
2. Lift top leg upward
3. Control movement
4. Switch sides

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.description: Static side hold for core stability.
exercises.method:
1. Side plank position
2. Stack feet
3. Lift hips
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Side Shuffle w/ Toe Touch
exercises.method:
1. Athletic stance
2. Shuffle sideways
3. Periodically touch opposite toe
4. Stay light on feet

exercises.name: Side Walk in Plank
exercises.description: Plank with lateral steps for core endurance.
exercises.method:
1. Plank position
2. Step sideways with hand and foot
3. Maintain straight body line
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Single Leg Calf Raise
exercises.method:
1. Stand on one leg
2. Raise up on toes
3. Lower slowly
4. Repeat

exercises.name: Skaters
exercises.description: Lateral jumps for power and balance.
exercises.method:
1. Start in slight squat
2. Leap side to side
3. Land softly
4. Touch floor with opposite hand

exercises.name: Spiderman Push-ups
exercises.method:
1. Push-up position
2. As you lower, bring knee to elbow
3. Alternate sides
4. Maintain straight body line

exercises.name: Split Jacks
exercises.method:
1. Start in wide stance
2. Jump while crossing arms
3. Return to wide stance
4. Alternate cross

exercises.name: Squat + Side Leg Raise
exercises.description: Squat with added abduction for glutes.
exercises.method:
1. Perform squat
2. As you stand, lift one leg to side
3. Alternate sides
4. Control movement

exercises.name: Squat Hold
exercises.method:
1. Lower into squat position
2. Hold at parallel
3. Keep chest up
4. Breathe steadily

exercises.name: Standing Back Leg Raises
exercises.method:
1. Stand tall, hold onto support
2. Kick one leg straight back
3. Squeeze glute at top
4. Alternate legs

exercises.name: Star Plank
exercises.description: Wide-arm plank variation for core challenge.
exercises.method:
1. Plank position with wide hand placement
2. Maintain straight body line
3. Engage core
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Step Jacks
exercises.method:
1. Step one foot out to side
2. Bring hands overhead
3. Return to center
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Sumo Ballerina Squat
exercises.description: Deep squat with heel lift for calves.
exercises.method:
1. Wide stance, toes pointed out
2. Lower into deep squat
3. Lift heels at bottom
4. Return to start

exercises.name: Supine Leg Raises
exercises.description: Lying leg lifts for lower abs.
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back, hands under hips
2. Lift legs to 90°
3. Lower slowly
4. Keep lower back pressed down

exercises.name: Tip Toe Sumo Squat
exercises.method:
1. Wide stance, toes pointed out
2. Rise onto toes
3. Lower into squat
4. Maintain balance

exercises.name: Toe Tap Hops
exercises.method:
1. Stand with one foot slightly forward
2. Quickly alternate toe taps
3. Stay light on feet
4. Maintain rhythm

exercises.name: Tree Pose
exercises.method:
1. Stand on one leg
2. Place opposite foot on inner thigh
3. Hands at heart center
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Tuck Jump
exercises.method:
1. Start in quarter squat
2. Explode upward, knees to chest
3. Land softly
4. Immediately repeat

exercises.name: Two-Point Plank
exercises.description: Alternating limb plank for core challenge.
exercises.method:
1. Plank position
2. Lift opposite arm and leg
3. Hold briefly
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Upward Facing Dog
exercises.method:
1. Lie prone, hands under shoulders
2. Press up, straightening arms
3. Keep hips lifted
4. Open chest

exercises.name: Warrior II
exercises.description: Yoga pose for leg and shoulder endurance.
exercises.method:
1. Wide stance, front knee bent
2. Arms extended parallel to floor
3. Gaze over front hand
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Seated Side Stretch
exercises.method:
1. Sit with legs crossed
2. Reach one arm overhead
3. Lean to opposite side
4. Hold stretch

exercises.name: Seated Side Twists
exercises.method:
1. Sit with legs extended
2. Twist torso to one side
3. Use opposite arm for leverage
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Seated Up Stretch
exercises.method:
1. Sit with legs straight
2. Reach forward toward toes
3. Keep back straight
4. Hold stretch

exercises.name: Seated Wide Leg Forward Fold
exercises.description: Seated straddle stretch for inner thighs.
exercises.method:
1. Wide seated straddle
2. Walk hands forward
3. Keep spine long
4. Hold stretch

exercises.name: Shadow Boxing
exercises.method:
1. Athletic boxing stance
2. Throw various punch combinations
3. Move around imaginary opponent
4. Maintain form

exercises.name: Shadow Boxing + Side Shifting
exercises.method:
1. Basic boxing stance
2. Add lateral steps between punches
3. Maintain balance
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Shoulder Rolls
exercises.method:
1. Stand tall
2. Roll shoulders in circular motion
3. Alternate directions
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Side Iso Ab Crunch
exercises.method:
1. Side-lying position
2. Lift torso upward
3. Focus on oblique contraction
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Side Leg Raises + Squat
exercises.description: Combination move for glutes and quads.
exercises.method:
1. Perform squat
2. As you stand, lift leg to side
3. Alternate sides
4. Control movement

exercises.name: Side to Side Hop
exercises.method:
1. Start in athletic stance
2. Jump side to side quickly
3. Land softly
4. Maintain control

exercises.name: Sidekicks
exercises.method:
1. Stand sideways to target
2. Lift knee, extend leg outward
3. Retract quickly
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Sideways Bear Crawl
exercises.method:
1. Bear crawl position
2. Move sideways
3. Cross hand over hand
4. Maintain low position

exercises.name: Single Leg Hops
exercises.method:
1. Stand on one leg
2. Hop forward/backward/sideways
3. Land softly
4. Maintain balance

exercises.name: Situps- Frog
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back, knees wide
2. Perform sit-up
3. Keep knees apart
4. Control descent

exercises.name: Skater
exercises.description: Lateral leap for power and balance.
exercises.method:
1. Start in slight squat
2. Leap laterally
3. Land on opposite leg
4. Touch floor with hand

exercises.name: Skipping
exercises.method:
1. Alternate hopping on each foot
2. Add arm swing
3. Light, bouncy movement
4. Maintain rhythm

exercises.name: Spiderman Mountain Climbers
exercises.method:
1. Plank position
2. Bring knee to same-side elbow
3. Alternate sides
4. Keep hips stable

exercises.name: Splits
exercises.description: Static stretch for hamstrings and hips.
exercises.method:
1. Gradually lower into split position
2. Use hands for support
3. Hold stretch
4. Breathe deeply

exercises.name: Sprawl
exercises.method:
1. From standing, drop hands to floor
2. Jump feet back to plank
3. Immediately return to standing
4. Repeat quickly

exercises.name: Squat + Kick
exercises.method:
1. Perform squat
2. As you stand, kick one leg forward
3. Alternate sides
4. Control movement

exercises.name: Squat + Reverse Lunges
exercises.method:
1. Perform squat
2. Step back into lunge
3. Return to squat
4. Alternate legs

exercises.name: Squat Hold + Punch
exercises.method:
1. Hold squat position
2. Throw alternating punches
3. Maintain squat depth
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Squat Side Punches
exercises.method:
1. Squat position
2. Throw punches to sides
3. Rotate from core
4. Maintain squat

exercises.name: Squat+Chair Pose
exercises.method:
1. Lower into squat
2. Raise arms overhead
3. Hold position
4. Breathe steadily

exercises.name: Squat+Front Kick
exercises.method:
1. Perform squat
2. As you stand, kick forward
3. Alternate sides
4. Control movement

exercises.name: Squat Jacks
exercises.method:
1. Start in narrow squat
2. Jump to wide squat
3. Alternate quickly
4. Land softly

exercises.name: Standing Backwards Bend
exercises.method:
1. Stand tall, hands on hips
2. Gently arch backward
3. Keep knees slightly bent
4. Hold stretch

exercises.name: Standing Front Leg Raises
exercises.description: Anterior leg lifts for hip flexors.
exercises.method:
1. Stand tall, hold support if needed
2. Lift one leg straight forward
3. Control movement
4. Alternate legs

exercises.name: Standing Side Leg Raises
exercises.description: Lateral leg lifts for gluteus medius.
exercises.method:
1. Stand tall, hold support
2. Lift one leg to side
3. Keep torso upright
4. Alternate legs

exercises.name: Standing Star Taps
exercises.method:
1. Stand in center of imaginary star
2. Reach to tap each point
3. Maintain balance
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Star Plank (1/2 Down)
exercises.description: Modified star plank for core endurance.
exercises.method:
1. Modified plank on knees
2. Wide hand placement
3. Hold position
4. Engage core

exercises.name: Straight Leg Standing Crunch
exercises.method:
1. Stand with hands behind head
2. Lift one knee while crunching
3. Alternate sides
4. Control movement

exercises.name: Straight Leg Toe Touches
exercises.method:
1. Stand with legs straight
2. Hinge at hips to reach toward toes
3. Keep back flat
4. Hold stretch

exercises.name: Straight Punches Standing
exercises.method:
1. Boxing stance
2. Throw straight punches
3. Rotate from core
4. Alternate arms

exercises.name: Sumo Squat / Chair Pose Combo
exercises.method:
1. Wide stance sumo squat
2. Transition to chair pose
3. Alternate between positions
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Sumo Squats
exercises.method:
1. Wide stance, toes pointed out
2. Lower into deep squat
3. Keep chest upright
4. Drive through heels

exercises.name: Supine Cycle Crunches
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back, hands behind head
2. Alternate elbow to opposite knee
3. Extend other leg
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Three Legged Dog
exercises.method:
1. Downward dog position
2. Lift one leg upward
3. Square hips
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Tip Toe Sumo Squat
exercises.description: Sumo squat on toes for calf engagement.
exercises.method:
1. Wide stance, toes pointed out
2. Rise onto toes
3. Lower into squat
4. Maintain balance

exercises.name: Toe Reaches (Wide Leg)
exercises.method:
1. Wide stance
2. Hinge at hips to reach toward floor
3. Keep back flat
4. Hold stretch

exercises.name: Toe Touches (Feet Together)
exercises.method:
1. Stand with feet together
2. Hinge at hips to reach toward toes
3. Keep knees slightly bent
4. Hold stretch

exercises.name: Travoltas
exercises.method:
1. Stand tall
2. Bring opposite knee to elbow
3. Alternate sides
4. Add hop for intensity

exercises.name: Two-Point Plank
exercises.description: Alternating limb plank for core challenge.
exercises.method:
1. Plank position
2. Lift opposite arm and leg
3. Hold briefly
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Uppercuts
exercises.description: Vertical boxing punches for shoulders and core.
exercises.method:
1. Boxing stance
2. Throw upward punches from waist
3. Rotate from core
4. Alternate arms

exercises.name: Walk Backwards
exercises.method:
1. Walk backward deliberately
2. Land toe-to-heel
3. Maintain upright posture
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Walking Sumo Squat (Low)
exercises.description: Wide-stance squat walk with low posture.
exercises.method:
1. Deep sumo squat position
2. Take small steps forward
3. Maintain low stance
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Walking Toe Touches
exercises.method:
1. Walk forward
2. Alternate touching toes with each step
3. Keep knees slightly bent
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Wide Squats (Plie)
exercises.method:
1. Wide stance, toes pointed out
2. Lower into squat
3. Keep knees tracking over toes
4. Drive through heels

exercises.name: Cinderblock Overhead Press
exercises.method:
1. Hold cinderblock at shoulders
2. Press overhead
3. Control descent
4. Keep core engaged

exercises.name: Cinderblock Bicep Curls
exercises.method:
1. Hold cinderblock with both hands
2. Curl upward
3. Squeeze at top
4. Control descent

exercises.name: Cinderblock / Farmers Carry
exercises.description: Loaded carry for grip and core.
exercises.method:
1. Hold heavy objects at sides
2. Walk with upright posture
3. Engage core
4. Controlled breathing

exercises.name: Half Lift & Fold
exercises.method:
1. Forward fold position
2. Lift halfway to flat back
3. Then fold deeper
4. Flow between positions

exercises.name: Happy Baby Pose
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back
2. Grab feet with hands
3. Open knees wide
4. Rock gently if desired

exercises.name: Head Turns (L-R & U-D)
exercises.method:
1. Slow side-to-side head turns
2. Then up-and-down motions
3. Full range of motion
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: High Lunge (Warrior 2)
exercises.method:
1. Lunge position
2. Arms extended parallel to floor
3. Square hips forward
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Knee & Ankle Rotations
exercises.method:
1. Seated or standing
2. Rotate ankles in circles
3. Then draw circles with knees
4. Alternate directions

exercises.name: Knee to Hands
exercises.description: Dynamic core and hip flexor movement.
exercises.method:
1. Stand tall
2. Lift knee while reaching hands down
3. Alternate sides
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Lying Knees to Chest
exercises.description: Supine knee hug for lower back relief.
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back
2. Hug knees to chest
3. Rock gently if desired
4. Hold stretch

exercises.name: Lying Leg Extensions
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back, knees bent
2. Extend one leg at a time
3. Control movement
4. Alternate legs

exercises.name: Seated Alt Leg Raises
exercises.method:
1. Sit on edge of chair
2. Alternate lifting legs
3. Keep torso upright
4. Control movement

exercises.name: Sealed Jacks
exercises.method:
1. Modified jumping jack without arm raise
2. Step feet out/in
3. Hands can stay at sides
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Seal Claps
exercises.method:
1. Stand with arms extended forward
2. Clap hands together then behind back
3. Continuous motion
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Side Kick
exercises.method:
1. Stand sideways to target
2. Lift knee, extend leg outward
3. Retract quickly
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Standing Upward Stretch
exercises.method:
1. Stand tall
2. Reach arms overhead
3. Interlace fingers, palms up
4. Hold stretch

exercises.name: Extended Triangle Pose
exercises.description: Yoga pose for hamstrings and obliques.
exercises.method:
1. Wide stance
2. Reach forward then down to one leg
3. Opposite arm reaches up
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Goddess Pose
exercises.method:
1. Wide stance, toes pointed out
2. Lower into squat
3. Arms in goalpost position
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Garland Pose / Deep Squat
exercises.method:
1. Deep squat position
2. Elbows inside knees
3. Hands at heart center
4. Hold position

exercises.name: Forward Fold
exercises.method:
1. Stand with feet together
2. Hinge at hips to fold forward
3. Let head hang heavy
4. Hold stretch

exercises.name: Low Plank Leg Raises
exercises.method:
1. Forearm plank position
2. Alternate lifting legs
3. Keep hips stable
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Low Side Lunges (Hands on Floor)
exercises.description: Lateral lunge with added stability challenge.
exercises.method:
1. Wide stance
2. Lower into side lunge with hands on floor
3. Keep chest up
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Low Squat Walk
exercises.method:
1. Deep squat position
2. Take small steps forward
3. Maintain low stance
4. Controlled movement

exercises.name: Lunge Punch
exercises.method:
1. Lunge forward
2. Throw opposite arm punch
3. Return to start
4. Alternate sides

exercises.name: Punches Standing
exercises.method:
1. Athletic boxing stance
2. Throw various punch combinations
3. Rotate from core
4. Maintain form

exercises.name: Savasana
exercises.method:
1. Lie flat on back
2. Arms at sides, palms up
3. Close eyes
4. Breathe deeply for 5-10 minutes

exercises.name: Sumo Squat + Side Leg Raise
exercises.method:
1. Perform sumo squat
2. As you stand, lift one leg to side
3. Alternate sides
4. Control movement

exercises.name: Toe-to-Wall Tibialis Raises
exercises.description: Standing tibialis isolation with back against wall for shin strength.
exercises.method:
1. Stand with back against wall, heels slightly away
2. Lift toes upward while keeping heels grounded
3. Slowly lower back down
4. Repeat for specified reps

exercises.name: Single Leg Glute Bridges
exercises.description: Unilateral hip extension exercise from supine position.
exercises.method:
1. Lie on back with one knee bent, other leg extended
2. Drive through heel to lift hips
3. Squeeze glutes at top
4. Lower with control

exercises.name: Heel Walks
exercises.description: Locomotion exercise emphasizing tibialis anterior engagement.
exercises.method:
1. Lift toes off ground
2. Walk forward on heels only
3. Maintain upright posture
4. Take small, controlled steps
